boxes.description: The project is on the Ethereum blockchain
The project is in the following categories: Blockchain Gaming, Non-Fungible Tokens, Entertainment, and Infrastructure.
The project token needs to be an ERC-20 token.
The project's token must have liquidity on DEX greater than $500k.
The project's token has an established history of trading, over the past 60 days.
The project has been audited.  All critical vulnerabilities must be addressed to mitigate contract risk.
